author: Sam Warner
title: Strictly Come Dancing: All the best tweets from tonight's episode - Strictly Come Dancing Reality TV -
text: It's another week of Strictly Come Dancing, this episode seeing plenty of strong performances (as well as a few terrible ones), with added chests and swingometers.Digital Spy had its eyes peeled on Twitter throughout the evening, and rounded up the best reactions. © BBC Pictures / Guy Levy Gleb's chest got many a chest pumping:The shirt came off and the internet's very happy! Thank you @Gleb_Savchenko pic.twitter.com/bwp0rWJRMl #strictly— Skint London (@SkintLondon) October 17, 2015Me when Gleb pulled his shirt off on @bbcstrictly #Strictly #SCD pic.twitter.com/cpdbr9V5DV— Jón Filipsson (@gaes_elskhugi) October 17, 2015Gleb is one ab away from looking like Peter Andre in the Mysterious Girl video. #Strictly— Carolyn Osborne (@caropickles) October 17, 2015Shirtless Gleb got me like #Strictly pic.twitter.com/x7jPlnAKQ7— R-POOZ (@Yeloop) October 17, 2015Wish Gleb would put his shirt back on. Said even less than no one, ever #strictly— Amanda (@deeleya) October 17, 2015Daughter: Mu ! Gleb has taken his shirt OFF!!! Husband: *mutters under breath* FFS #strictly— knowingkimberly (@knowingkimberly) October 17, 2015Jeremy Vine's splish wasn't making much of a splash:Jeremy Vine needs a warning on screen before he 'dances' #Strictly— Montys Dog Nigel (@montysdognigel) October 17, 2015Jeremy Vine on #Strictly pic.twitter.com/bbob2RRgCT— Ben Travis (@BenSTravis) October 17, 2015He's game anyway. #Strictly pic.twitter.com/BuqZd4JJR5— Neil Henderson (@hendopolis) October 17, 2015Ah well, at least the phrase 'Jeremy Vine's jive' has a nice ring to it... #strictly— Miss L (@ProResting) October 17, 2015Jeremy Vine dances like a clothes horse in an earthquake. #Strictly— Nick Pettigrew (@Nick_Pettigrew) October 17, 2015Thing is, for me #Strictly has to have one who's a bit hopeless but hugely entertaining and Jeremy fulfils that brief perfectly.— Corrie Corfield (@corrie_corfield) October 17, 2015Neither was his swingometer (thanks Len...):I think Darcey still has Jeremy's swingometer in her head. #Strictly— Andy Simon (@AndySimon55) October 17, 2015Oh Len, leave Jeremy's swingometer alone! #scd— Noel Gay (@NoelGay19) October 17, 2015My 6 year old asks 'what's a swingometer?' #strictly— Sally Forgan (@sallyforgan) October 17, 2015Daniel's flight routine wasn't fooling anyone:A closer look at that plane Daniel O'Donnell was just flying#Strictly #SCD pic.twitter.com/GuJfCPmeYP— Adam Ippititimus (@Adders500) October 17, 2015How is that this picture of a Lego pilot has more charm and charisma than Daniel O'Donnell #Strictly pic.twitter.com/5rVp4Heh3E— Phillip Beauzeville (@Pablo942000) October 17, 2015Where have I seen Daniel O'Donnell before...?#SCD #Strictly pic.twitter.com/chL7uNqlG5— Lee Thacker (@FubsyShabaroon) October 17, 2015The caption is actually the most disturbing thing about this. #scd pic.twitter.com/Dn0gXWWhEm— Jamie (@jtlovell1979) October 17, 2015Many people had set their hopes on Jay, especially after last week's triumph:Oh yes it's @JayMcGuiness time #Strictly #scd pic.twitter.com/tAxPyzDmkh— LOOK magazine (@Lookmagazine) October 17, 2015Every other #Strictly contestant watching Jay McGuinness from the balcony. pic.twitter.com/9AP2qrauS2— IncrediblyRich (@IncrediblyRich) October 17, 2015Though he didn't quite live up to expectations:#strictlycomedancing so sad about Jay stumbling - he's my favourite!— Joan Collins (@Joancollinsdbe) October 17, 2015Aw. We REALLY feel for Jay #Strictly pic.twitter.com/nHOAPfFb3J— OK! Magazine (@OK_Magazine) October 17, 2015Bless Jay. Those ball changes can be a bugger. #dear #strictly— westendproducer (@westendproducer) October 17, 2015Anyone else want to give Jay a hug right now? #strictly— SCD Support Group (@scd_support) October 17, 2015Peter Andre triumphed again, though his song choice of New Order's 80s classic 'Blue Monday' got a mixed response:New Order on #Strictly + Peter Andre = cultural black hole— Grayson Perry (@Alan_Measles) October 17, 2015So when @neworder concocted Blue Monday back in '83 I bet they didn't expect it'd be a tango on a ballroom dancing TV show! #Strictly #scd— SteveTaylorArtsMedia (@SteveTaylorArts) October 17, 2015An angry tango to New Order. This could work #strictly— Elaine Dunkley (@Millicent32) October 17, 2015Have I suffered some sort of head trauma or is that Peter Andre ballroom dancing to New Order?— Matthew Sweet (@DrMatthewSweet) October 17, 2015This is how the world ends. Not with a bang, but with Peter Andre doing a tango to Blue Monday. #Strictly— Peter Ross (@PeterAlanRoss) October 17, 2015Wow! "Blue Monday" on #strictly Awesome! @neworder @peterhook— WBA Stefan (@wbastefan) October 17, 2015Strictly Come Dancing: The Results shows tomorrow on BBC One at 7.15pm.
